definitions: a country that sends settlers to a place and establishes political control over it

examples.text: Portugal was a major colonizer in both Brazil and parts of Africa

shortDefinitions: country that sends settlers to place and establishes political control

definitions: a person who settles among and establishes political control over the indigenous people of an area

examples.text: they are among the few indigenous groups who were never converted to Catholicism by Spanish colonizers

shortDefinitions: person who settles among indigenous people of area

definitions: a plant or animal that establishes itself in an area

examples.text: oysters and barnacles tend to be among the first colonizers of new spaces in the marine world

shortDefinitions: plant that establishes itself in area
